<title>Greetings from Asbury Park, N.J. | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="The first studio album from Bruce Springsteen." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/greetings-from-asbury-park-n-j-2/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Greetings from Asbury Park, N.J." />
<meta property="og:description" content="The first studio album from Bruce Springsteen. Although it featured musicians Bruce regularly played with and who would later become members of the E Street Band (Clarence Clemons, David Sancious and Garry Tallent), this was considered a solo outing. “Blinded By The Light” would later become a #1 hit for Manfred Mann’s Earth Band." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/greetings-from-asbury-park-n-j-2/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />

<meta property="og:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/1973/01/springsteen-asbury-front2-og.jpg" />
	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="630" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Greetings from Asbury Park, N.J." />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="The first studio album from Bruce Springsteen. Although it featured musicians Bruce regularly played with and who would later become members of the E Street Band (Clarence Clemons, David Sancious and Garry Tallent), this was considered a solo outing. “Blinded By The Light” would later become a #1 hit for Manfred Mann’s Earth Band." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/1973/01/springsteen-asbury-front2-og.jpg" />

yoast_head_json.title: Greetings from Asbury Park, N.J. | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: The first studio album from Bruce Springsteen.
yoast_head_json.og_description: The first studio album from Bruce Springsteen. Although it featured musicians Bruce regularly played with and who would later become members of the E Street Band (Clarence Clemons, David Sancious and Garry Tallent), this was considered a solo outing. “Blinded By The Light” would later become a #1 hit for Manfred Mann’s Earth Band.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: The first studio album from Bruce Springsteen. Although it featured musicians Bruce regularly played with and who would later become members of the E Street Band (Clarence Clemons, David Sancious and Garry Tallent), this was considered a solo outing. “Blinded By The Light” would later become a #1 hit for Manfred Mann’s Earth Band.
